name: ANCEL BA101 Car Battery Tester, 12V Digital Automotive Alternator Meter Diagnostic Tool,100-2000 CCA Load Capacity, Charging & Cranking Analyzer for Truck, Boat, RV, Marine Vehicle, and More
short_description: Feature Highlights: This 12V battery tester is a reliable tool for vehicle maintenance. It offers quick tests for battery health, voltage, and charge status, along with cranking and charging system tests to assess performance and ensure the reliability of your vehicle

Accurate Testing: This car battery tester features advanced crocodile clips for a secure grip, high-quality copper for excellent conductivity, and an intelligent chip for precise diagnostics. It provides 99.6% accuracy, offering reliable data on your battery's condition. For accurate results, ensure correct battery type, standard, CCA/AH value, and confirm temperature (above/below 0°C)

User-Friendly Design: Enjoy effortless testing with an intuitive interface and a large LCD display featuring adjustable contrast and a white backlight for clear readings. Designed for one-handed operation, it prioritizes convenience. Plus, with support for multiple languages, it accommodates diverse users seamlessly

Safety Shield Pro: Confidently tackle tests with 4-in-1 safeguards neutralizing polarity reversal/short circuits/overcurrent/overvoltage, shielded by 3x-reinforced ABS to block battery damage & user risks—precision-engineered for uncompromised equipment performance.

Universal 12V Power Solution – Combines global compliance (JIS/EN/DIN/SAE/BCI/GB/CA/MCA/IEC) , ensuring reliability for cars, trucks, boats, RVs and more. Compatible with Flooded/AGM/GEL/EFB batteries. Note: Excludes lithium, 6V/8V/24V batteries

Work in your language: with the BA101 alternator tester, a versatile battery analyzer offering multi-language support for effortless diagnostics, a handy print function to record and share battery health details, and global compatibility—all designed for your convenience, precision, and ease of use

Quick Test Attention: Input the correct AH value for accurate results. Incorrect values may inaccurate results. If unsure, use the battery test feature by entering the CCA value from the battery label instead. Note: Batteries below 30 AH are not supported. Ensure compatibility before testing

name: La Crosse 911-65557-INT Portable Digital Battery Tester,Black
short_description: Test rechargeable and alkaline batteries
Works for all: AAA, AA, C, D, N, 9V batteries and Lithium Ion button cell

Simple Operation in 3 easy steps: 1) Select Voltage range (1.5V, 1.2V, or 3.0V depending on battery type used, 2) Pull orange tray outward and insert one battery into the tester correct direction of polarity, 3) Slide tray closed for positive connection and LED will display voltage and strength levels. Remove battery when test is complete.
Multiple types: Select 1.5V for alkaline AA, AAA, C, D, & N batteries; Select 1.2V for rechargeable AA, AAA, C, D & N batteries; Select 3V for lithium button cell battery
Touch contacts on left side of tester for 9V battery
product_description: Don't throw away Good batteries! Test them first. The portable battery tester by La Crosse Technology tests one battery at a time. Test your rechargeable or alkaline batteries in the following sizes: AAA, AA, C, D, N and 3V lithium button cell batteries, also side contacts for 9V batteries. The compact size allows you to carry the tester with you on the go in a purse, camera bag, luggage or backpack. Simple operation: Select battery voltage, insert battery according to polarity, pressing tester to make contact you can read battery strength on LCD.

name: Battery Tester SL-049 - Professional Digital Battery Checker with LCD Display for Household AA, AAA, AAAA,C, D, 9V, Button Cells. Compact Design with Clear Power Level Indicator
short_description: Essential Battery Testing Tool - This reliable battery tester helps eliminate guesswork by providing precise voltage readings and power level indicators. The clear LCD display shows exact battery health status, letting you quickly identify which batteries need replacement.

Versatile Multi-Battery Design - Expertly tests virtually all common battery types with dedicated testing slots. Compatible with AA, AAA, AAAA,C, D, N, 9V, and various button cell batteries including CR2016, CR2032, and LR44. Uniquely tests 1.2V rechargeable AA, AAA, and AAAA batteries.The smart detection system prevents incorrect testing.

This battery tester features real-load testing:　AA/AAA/AAAA/C/D: Discharge resistor 20Ω（≈75ｍＡ）//1.2V rechargeable batteries: Discharge resistor 30Ω（≈40ｍＡ）//CR2/CR123A: Discharge resistor 30Ω（≈100ｍＡ）//LR44 button cells: Discharge resistor 1KΩ（≈1.5ｍＡ）//CR2032: Discharge resistor 1KΩ（≈3ｍＡ）//9V batteries: Discharge resistor 1KΩ（≈9ｍＡ）

Clear Power Level Display - Features an easy-to-read LCD screen showing exact voltage plus a colored power indicator bar displaying Good, Weak, or Poor status. No more uncertainty about remaining battery life - get instant, accurate results every time.

Portable Convenience - The thoughtfully designed compact size (4.7 x 2.8 inches) fits easily in drawers, tool boxes, or bags. Requires one AAA battery for operation (not included) with low power warning indicator to ensure reliable operation when you need it.

Durable Construction - Built with high-quality materials and precise engineering for long-lasting performance. The sturdy test slots and spring-loaded contacts provide consistent readings while protecting batteries during testing. Patent pending

name: ANENG BT189 Battery Tester for AAA,AA,C,D,9V,F,6F22,1.5V/3V Button Batteries,LCD Display Household Battery Detector,Detects Battery Power by Voltage,Universal Battery Checker
short_description: Widely Used:ANENG battery tester is a versatile tool designed to assess various types of batteries. It can test AA, AAA, C, D, N, 9V, and 1.5V/3.7V lithium batteries, as well as CR2032, LR44, and L736 button cells. This compact battery checker is an essential addition to any home electrical testing toolkit

Digital LCD Display:ANENG BT189 is a easy-to-use battery tester features a digital LCD screen that provides clear and accurate readings of your battery's condition, displaying the voltage levels to indicate whether the battery is depleted, performing marginally, or in optimal health

Easy to Use: Just insert a battery into the digital battery tester, and it will immediately display whether the battery's voltage is in poor, weak, or good condition. The tester reliably identifies the battery's status, making it ideal for families who frequently use both standard and rechargeable batteries. This helps determine if a battery can still be used or needs recharging, effectively reducing waste

New Battery-Free Design:ANENG Household Battery Tester operates without the need for its own power source, instead drawing power directly from the battery being tested, ensuring a longer service life.Note: DON'T POWERED BY RECHARGEABLE BATTERY NOR TEST RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES
Compact and Portable: ANENG battery tester is lightweight and easy to carry, allowing you to check your batteries anytime, anywhere. Despite its small size, it is robust and offers high precision

name: KONNWEI KW208 12V Car Battery Tester, 100-2000 CCA Load Tester Automotive Alternator Tester Digital Auto Battery Analyzer Charging Cranking System Tester for Truck Marine Motorcycle SUV Boat
short_description: 【Reliable Automotive Car Battery Tester】 KW208 is the most cost-effective battery tester compared to other brands, it has all the functions you need and the lowest spend that you can afford. KW208 can test all 12V 100-2000CCA batteries including regular flooded, AGM flat plate, AGM spiral, or gel batteries. Provide overall analysis of batteries’ health and help you know their status in advance before it dies. KW208 battery tester supports cranking and charging system tests also alternator and starter test. Perfect Xmas and New Year gifts for men and gifts for women. Conveniently store this battery charger for batteries in your glove box or garage, ready for use whenever needed.

【Display Overall Batteries Data】KW208 12V Battery Load Tester gives you reliable and overall battery parameters such as voltage, internal resistance, cold cranking amp and AH capacity, battery health and charge status. Additionally, battery cca tester will also show you professional advice whether to replace or recharge the battery. NEW REPLACEMENT AVAILABLE FOR ANY QUALITY ISSUE.

【 >99.99% High Accuracy】Thanks to KW208’s powerful and smart AI chip, it provides more than 99.99% precise testing reports within milliseconds, greatly improving the testing speed and testing accuracy compared to other battery testers. Besides KW208 is the only battery tester that has over 6000+ rating and is the most reliable and popular car battert tester on Amazon.

【Plug and Play】 KW208 Battery load analyzer allows you to test batteries both in-vehicle and out-of-vehicle, and even test dead batteries. Just connect the tester’s clips with battery then it will turn on and ready to test and analyze battery. It’s that easy!

【Starter& Alternator Tester】KW208 not only a great battery load tester that tests batteries cranking & charging system but also can test alternator's charging and starter's cranking conditions. And it can switch up to 8 languages for different needs.
